body.p: Noise immune signal bus(s) are used; optical and/or Can Bus are used to route signal between logic PCBs.

Each Signal Bus continuously transmits “Bus Integrity” signals, when not transmitting true data. If the “Bus Integrity” signals are not received by all receivers, then that bus is considered discontinuous and is alarmed. All signal buses are tri-redundant. The CAN Bus has circular redundancy so that there are two paths; one path can be severed and the signal will flow via the other path.
